overview_of_class: Ballet I is designed to learn a basic Classical Ballet Technique. Students will learn how to properly execute each step, how to connect them together, and the correct vocabulary of each step. The class has a big emphasis on proper alignment and understanding of the body to be able to build strength and flexibility in order to prevent injuries. Class consists of a warm up with a series of exercises at the Barre, follow by center work including Adagio, Pirouettes, Waltz, and finishes with a series of jumps combinations. This Class does not require previous Ballet training therefore students do not need the instructor permission.
